directions: Melt butter in a skillet; cook and stir onion just until soft and translucent, about 3 minutes. Stir tomatoes, green chiles, and salt into onion mixture; reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, until liquid evaporates, about 10 minutes.
Stir Cheddar cheese into green chile mixture; cook until melted, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
title: Jan's Chile Con Queso
